Eric Hudson (amụrụ n'October 15, 1986) bụ ónyé America na onye na-emepụta egwu na-enweta onyinye Grammy.
Nne na nna ya bụ Curtis na Phyllis Bivins-Hudson
Curtis bụ ónyé na-ede egwu na ónyé na-emepụta egwu, na nke kachasị pụta ìhè bụ ónyé na'ede egwu Madonna "Holiday", nke ya na ónyé na'agụ egwu / onye na-agụ egwu Lisa Stevens dere.
Hudson gàrà Columbia High School na Maplewood, New Jersey, ma gụsịrị akwụkwọ na 2004.
Ọ bụ ónyé na-egwu ọtụtụ ngwá egwu (gụnyere piano, drum, bass, guitar, na organ), ma nụchaa ọtụtụ n'ime mmepe egwu mbụ ya na-akpọ na ụka ma na-eduzi otu egwu jazz nke ya a na-akpọ Jazz Funk Project.
Hudson egwuriwo egwu na Carnegie Hall, ma rụọ ọrụ na Apollo Theater na Harlem màkà 2002 Democratic National Convention [nkọwa dị mkpa].
Mmalite mbụ ya n'ime ụlọ ọrụ ahụ malitere site n'ịrụ ọrụ n'akụkụ ndị na-emepụta hip hop Buckwild na DJ Kay Gee site na Naughty by Nature
Hudson bụ ónyé na-eji ngwá ọrụ eme ihe na abọm abụọ, The Game's The Documentary na 50 Cent's The Massacre, nké nyeere aka iwere ọrụ ya gaa na ọkwa ọzọ
N'oge na-adịghị ányá, o mepụtara egwu "Entourage" nke Omarion.
